# netbox_power_outlet_template (Data Source)

Retrieves information about a power outlet template in NetBox.

## Example Usage

```terraform
# Example 1: Lookup by ID
data "netbox_power_outlet_template" "by_id" {
  id = 1
}

output "power_outlet_template_by_id" {
  value       = data.netbox_power_outlet_template.by_id.name
  description = "Power outlet template name when looked up by ID"
}

# Example 2: Lookup by name and device_type
data "netbox_power_outlet_template" "by_device_type_and_name" {
  device_type = 10
  name        = "PSU"
}

output "power_outlet_template_by_device_type" {
  value       = data.netbox_power_outlet_template.by_device_type_and_name.type
  description = "Power outlet template type"
}

# Example 3: Lookup by name and module_type
data "netbox_power_outlet_template" "by_module_type_and_name" {
  module_type = 5
  name        = "PSU"
}

output "power_outlet_template_by_module_type" {
  value       = data.netbox_power_outlet_template.by_module_type_and_name.label
  description = "Power outlet template label"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `device_type` (Number) The numeric ID of the device type. Used with name for lookup when ID is not provided.
- `id` (Number) The unique numeric ID of the power outlet template.
- `module_type` (Number) The numeric ID of the module type. Used with name for lookup when ID is not provided.
- `name` (String) The name of the power outlet template. Used with device_type or module_type for lookup when ID is not provided.

### Read-Only

- `description` (String) A description of the power outlet template.
- `display_name` (String) The display name of the power outlet template.
- `feed_leg` (String) Phase leg for three-phase power.
- `label` (String) Physical label of the power outlet template.
- `power_port` (Number) The power port template ID that feeds this outlet.
- `type` (String) The type of power outlet.
